item.title: Joshua add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "Fiction is like a spider's web, attached ever so lightly perhaps, but still attached to life at all four corners." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Joshua add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "Why did you do all this for me?' he asked. 'I don't deserve it. I've never done anything for you.' 'You have been my friend,' replied Charlotte. 'That in itself is a tremendous thing." -- E.B. White

item.title: Joshua add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Joshua add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Joshua add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Joshua add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Joshua add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Joshua add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "Life, with its rules, its obligations, and its freedoms, is like a sonnet: You're given the form, but you have to write the sonnet yourself. - Mrs. Whatsit" -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Joshua add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "Maybe you have to know the darkness before you can appreciate the light." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Joshua add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "It's hard to let go anything we love. We live in a world which teaches us to clutch. But when we clutch we're left with a fistful of ashes." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Joshua add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Joshua add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is impossible to live without failing at something, unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all - in which case, you fail by default." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Joshua add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "The truth." Dumbledore sighed. "It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Joshua add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Joshua add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Let us step into the night and pursue that flighty temptress, adventure." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Joshua add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "A little nonsense now and then, is cherished by the wisest men." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Joshua add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "We are the music makers, and we are the dreamers of dreams." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Joshua add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "I can't go back to yesterday because I was a different person then." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Joshua add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Joshua add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Reality continues to ruin my life." -- Bill Watterson
